bibl.title: Satyric Diction in the Extant Sophoclean Fragments: A Reconsideration.
Shards from Kolonos: Studies in Sophoclean Fragments
bibl.author: REDONDO, Jordi

bibl.note: I. Introduction; methodological criteria. - II. Characteristic features of the extant Sophoclean fragments: linguistic and stylistic devices shared with comedy. - III. Some plays of disputed genre. - IV. Conclusion.
REDONDO Jordi, Satyric Diction in the Extant Sophoclean Fragments: A Reconsideration.
Alan H. SOMMERSTEIN (Ed.), Shards from Kolonos: Studies in Sophoclean Fragments = Le Rane. 34 (Bari, 2003) pp. 413-431.
